name: Lost in Pandation
description:
A short survival game with a panda, lots of snow, nightmare creatures and a cable car.

Trapped in an apartment at the top of a building after some sort of apocalypse, you try to survive the winter and find a way to escape this place.

I created this game in 72h for the Ludum Dare 37, so I really hope you'll enjoy it :) The theme was "One Room". Music by Volkor X.
